title: Tradify
noscript: Javascript must be enabled in your browser for this page to work properly. Please activate it and reload the page.
lead: This app allows users to identify traditional Quebec and Irish tunes and retrieve their sheet music. It is heavily inspired by the work of Tom Willy (FolkFriend).
download: Download the sheet music in ZIP format
repositoryDescription: A repository for Quebec and irish sheet music.
folksetDescription: The Github repository for a partition reader project for Android devices.
musescoreDescription: An application that allows you to format your sheet music.
folkFriendDescription: FolkFriend listens to your music and searches for matches in The Session database.
thesessionDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional Irish music.
montrealsessionDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional Irish music in Montreal.
vitrifolkDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional Canadian music.
familleremonDescription: The Remon family's collection of sheet music.
leviolondejosDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional Quebec music.
tunearchDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional music.
folktunefinderDescription: A repository of sheet music for traditional music.
footer: Adapted from the work of Tom Wyllie (FolkFriend) by Ludovic A.-Lussier.
Title: Title
userMediaNotSupported: Your browser does not support this application. Please change browser.
insufficentDataForAnalysis: The recorded data is insufficent to proceed further with analysis. You may be playing your music too softly.
insufficentDataForSearch: The recorded data is insufficent to proceed further with the search. You may be playing your music too softly.
